ja501:16.1: Kathaṁ tvaṁ pamokkho → kathaṁ pamokkho (bj, pts-vp-pli1); kathaṁ te pamokkho (?)
ja501:22.3: Abajjhi taṁ → abajjhi tañca (bj, pts-vp-pli1); abajjhi ta (sya2ed)
ja501:27.4: umāpupphasarinnibhaṁ → ummāpupphasirinibhaṁ (bj); ummāpupphasirinnibhaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ja501:29.1: Kasivāṇijjā → kasī vaṇijjā (bj, pts-vp-pli1); kasivaṇijjā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
